name: William (Will) Ortmayer
text: Necessary stop for any hike on the Pinhoti. Kim and Nathan go above and beyond anything you could ask for. The Outdoor Center provides a comfortable place to stay as well as very helpful support along the trail.

resp.text: Thanks Will!  We hope you enjoyed your hike! Can't wait to hear all about it! -kimm

name: Sonya Askew
text:
The Pinhoti Outdoor Center was fantastic! We enjoyed two nights at the hostel and found it clean and cozy with every amenity that a hiker could want: laundry, hot shower, loaner clothes, and a kitchen with an honor bar of snacks and beverages.
Kim and Nathan went out of their way to welcome us, shuttle as needed, and shared their vast knowledge of the Pinhoti Trail. Thank you so much!

resp.text: Thank you and thanks for choosing the POC, have a great hike!

name: Mollie Waters
text: Nathan and Kimm Wright are wonderful! The hostel is nice. Very clean and comfortable.

resp.text: Thanks Mollie, can't wait for your next visit!

name: Emma Rose
text: The owners are so kind and helpful! Nathan helped me figure out how to set up my tent in the rain, and Kim helped me out when I forgot some supplies. They also went out of their way to return the pillow I left there. None of this was expected, but was very much appreciated!

resp.text: Thank you Emma! Hope you had a great hike and thanks for choosing the POC!

name: Fuego Postal
text: Great spot.  I stopped by earlier this year when it was still in progress.  I deeply appreciate all the work Nathan has put into the place.  For those of you not in the know, the POC is a hostel/ rec space in close proximity to the Pinhoti trail.  The Pinhoti trail is Alabama's mini-me version of the Appalachian Trail.  In fact, you can connect to the AT all the way up to Canada if you so desire.

resp.text: Thank you Fuego!  Come back and see us!  Happy hiking!

name: Noah Smith
text: The best hostel I've ever been to nathan is no joke the kindest hostel owner I've meet

name: Team Coleman (Harley & Jessica)
text: If you're doing a thru or section hike of the Pinhoti trail, call the P.O.C before you go. Make it a plan to stay there at least once. They're awesome and will take great care of you and are very knowledgeable about the Pinhoti and surrounding areas.

resp.text: Awesome!  Thank you for choosing the POC!

name: Jon Turner
text: Y'all are the coolest folks I have been around in a very long time.  Looking forward to spending more time learning from y'all.

resp.text: Aww, thanks a ton.  That means a lot to us.  We appreciate you and hope you come back to visit!  Happy hiking!

name: Robert D
text: If you are starting out backpacking, this is a great place to visit. They let me park my car and shuttled me to the trailhead.  Very knowledgeable of the local trails. Will definitely be back.

resp.text: Thank you Robert!  Can't wait to see you on trail again!  Happy Hiking!

name: Greg S
text: Very responsive to support requests, nice area to leave vehicle

name: Robbie eng
text:
Wonderful experience and hosts are extremely helpful and accommodating!  Must stop on the Pinhoti trail!  Thank you for everything Switchback, you're the man!
Mongo, Lickskillet Hostel

resp.text: Thanks so much Mongo!! Hope you'll Come back soon!
Thanks for the review... What could we have done to earn that 5th star?  See you again next year my friend!-Kimm

name: Brandon Gamble
text: I haven't visited, but this popped up in my google reviews, and honestly, anything with Pinhoti in their name had my full endorsement!!

resp.text: Thanks Brandon.  Check us out on Facebook.  We'll be opening soon!  You'll have to stop in and see us!
